title: EVARON Battery Company Website - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create hero section with headline, subheading, and scroll-to-contact CTA button
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the exact headline and subheading text
Contact Us button is prominently displayed
Button smoothly scrolls to the contact section when clicked

file_operations.description: Create hero section component with headline 'Powering the Future of Energy', subheading 'Advanced Lithium & EV Battery Solutions', and Contact Us button that smoothly scrolls to contact form. Use generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png as background. Apply black, orange, and white color scheme with bold heading.
Import and render HeroSection component at the top of the page layout. Ensure proper integration with scrolling behavior for contact section navigation.

requirements.summary: Create About section describing EVARON's battery solutions
acceptanceCriteria: About section includes descriptive text about EVARON's battery solutions
Text emphasizes high-performance, durability, and safety
Section mentions both EV and solar system applications

file_operations.description: Create About section component with descriptive text explaining that EVARON provides high-performance, durable, and safe battery solutions for EVs and solar systems. Use professional layout with black, orange, and white color scheme.
Import and render AboutSection component below HeroSection in the page layout.

requirements.summary: Create Products section with three product cards
acceptanceCriteria: Three distinct product cards are displayed
Each card shows the correct product name
Cards are visually consistent and well-organized
Layout is responsive across screen sizes

file_operations.description: Create Products section component displaying three product cards: 'EV Lithium Battery' (using frontend/public/assets/generated/ev-battery.dim_400x300.png), 'Solar Storage Battery' (using frontend/public/assets/generated/solar-battery.dim_400x300.png), and 'Industrial Battery Pack' (using frontend/public/assets/generated/industrial-battery.dim_400x300.png). Ensure responsive grid layout and consistent card styling with black, orange, and white theme.
Import and render ProductsSection component below AboutSection in the page layout.

requirements.summary: Create Why Choose Us section with four key benefits
acceptanceCriteria: All four benefits are displayed clearly
Each benefit is presented with consistent styling
Section is visually distinct from other sections

file_operations.description: Create Why Choose Us section component highlighting four benefits: 'Long Life Cycle', 'Fast Charging', 'High Safety Standards', and 'Energy Efficient'. Use grid layout with icons or visual indicators, maintaining black, orange, and white color scheme.
Import and render WhyChooseUsSection component below ProductsSection in the page layout.

requirements.summary: Create Contact section with form and implement submission handling
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form displays Name, Email, and Message input fields
Form validates required fields before submission
Form data is successfully submitted to the backend
User receives visual feedback on successful submission

file_operations.description: Create Contact section component with form containing Name, Email, and Message fields. Implement form validation and submission using backend.submitContactForm method from backend interface. Add success/error feedback messages and loading states. Include id attribute for scroll targeting from hero CTA button.
Import and render ContactSection component below WhyChooseUsSection in the page layout. Ensure section has proper id for scroll navigation.

requirements.summary: Create professional footer with EVARON company name
acceptanceCriteria: Footer is present at the bottom of the page
Footer displays 'EVARON' company name
Footer styling is consistent with overall design

file_operations.description: Create Footer component displaying 'EVARON' company name with professional styling using black, orange, and white color scheme. Include generated logo frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_200x80.png.
Import and render Footer component at the bottom of the page layout after all content sections.

requirements.summary: Apply modern corporate design with black, orange, and white color scheme
acceptanceCriteria: Primary color palette uses black, orange, and white
Headings use bold font weights
Overall design appears modern and professional
Layout follows corporate design principles with clear hierarchy

file_operations.description: Update global styles to establish black, orange, and white color scheme as CSS custom properties. Set bold font weights for headings. Apply modern, clean, professional styling foundation for corporate look.

Configure Tailwind theme with custom colors for black, orange, and white palette. Set default font weights for headings to bold. Configure spacing and layout utilities for professional corporate design.

requirements.summary: Ensure full responsive design for mobile and desktop
acceptanceCriteria: Website adapts to mobile screen sizes without horizontal scroll
All sections are readable and functional on mobile devices
Desktop layout makes effective use of larger screen space
Navigation and interactions work smoothly on both mobile and desktop

file_operations.description: Ensure App component uses responsive container classes and proper viewport configuration. Test all section components render correctly on mobile and desktop breakpoints.
Add responsive text sizing, spacing, and layout adjustments for mobile and desktop viewports using Tailwind breakpoint classes.
Implement responsive grid that stacks on mobile (1 column) and expands on desktop (3 columns). Ensure product cards scale appropriately.
Add responsive grid layout that adapts from single column on mobile to multi-column on desktop. Ensure benefit cards remain readable at all breakpoints.
Ensure contact form is fully usable on mobile with appropriate input sizing and spacing. Adjust layout for better desktop presentation.
